overview: Mr. Brandon Moffatt has extensive management and technical experience in the environmental, waste and renewable energy sectors. He had developed a consulting practice in the waste sector for a large consulting engineering firm for 10 years prior to joining Chris at StormFisher Biogas. At StormFisher, he led the execution of projects and became knowledgeable in the areas of corporate/project development including engineering design, permitting, commercial negotiations, feedstock procurement and corporate/project finance. He was also involved in the sale of the company to a joint venture of GE and AES. Brandon and Chris subsequently led a management buyback of the firm before selling its flagship project to a U.S. based renewable energy company and supporting the acquirer on the execution of the project.Brandon has an MBA from the Odette School of Business and holds a B.ASc. in Environmental Engineering from the University of Waterloo.
